/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered throughout the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, further enhancing the lively atmosphere.
